name: Roasted Tomato, Grilled Corn, and Shrimp Salad
author: Marie's Dressings
summary: Marie's® Roasted Tomato with Parmesan & Basil Vinaigrette makes for a delicious marinade for the shrimp in this grilled corn and zucchini salad.
ingredients: Marie's® Roasted Tomato with Parmesan & Basil Vinaigrette
8  large shrimp, peeled and deveined, or more to taste
Skewers (if wooden, soak in water the night before)
directions: Brush Marie's Roasted Tomato with Parmesan and Basil Vinaigrette over each piece of shrimp until evenly coated
Brush the ears of corn and zucchini slices with olive oil, then place on the grill for 6 to 10 minutes, until grill marks appear
Place the shrimp skewers on the grill and cook 2 to 3 minutes on each side
After removing the corn and zucchini from the grill, slice the corn kernels off of each cob and cut the zucchini slices into smaller bite-sized pieces
In a medium-sized bowl, mix the corn, zucchini, tomatoes, red onion, shrimp, and feta together
Drizzle a generous amount of Marie's Roasted Tomato with Parmesan and Basil Vinaigrette over the salad and toss together
